Georgetown Design District for Fall Days of Design Nov. 2-4

Join the Georgetown Design District for Fall Days of Design, Nov. 2-4. The three-day scheduled event invites interior designers, design enthusiasts and shoppers alike to visit participating design and home furnishings stores for new collection launches, trunk shows and design consultations.

R.I.P. Carly Rothman—Lover of Library eBooks, Jimmy Dean Sausage Biscuits, and Me

When Carly and I were among strangers, we would sometimes hold hands, gaze into each other’s eyes as if newlyweds, and tell gawkers: “It’s ok. We’ve only been married two days. We’ll get over it.” Of course, we never did—not in 26 years of marriage.

Rehoboth Beach is More than a Summer Resort
